curated_text: Symbol: PFE. Year: 2023. Period: Q3. ReportType: Q10. Section: Competition and Market Position. This section discusses competitors, market dynamics, and regulatory landscape.  Competitors mentioned: BMS, the High Court’s, the Court of Appeal, CureVac AG, CureVac, the German Regional Court, Comirnaty, Trademark Office, the European Patent Office, PFIZER INC., UNAUDITED, FDA, the U.S., District Court, Sinotherapeutics Inc., Sinotherapeutics, Ibrance, Eucrisa, Alnylam Pharmaceuticals, Inc., Alnylam, Pfizer, Pharmacia & Upjohn Co., LLC, ModernaTX, Inc., ModernaTX, Moderna US, US Inc., Arbutus Biopharma Corp., Arbutus, Genevant Sciences GmbH, Enanta Pharmaceuticals, Inc., Collaboration/Licensing Partners Comirnaty, Medivation Prostate Therapeutics LLC, Astellas Pharma Inc., Astellas US, Zydus Pharmaceuticals (USA) Inc., Zydus Lifesciences Ltd., Sun, Federal Court, Biocon Pharma Limited, ScieGen Pharmaceuticals Inc., ScieGen, Biocon, Warner-Lambert, American Optical Corporation, American Optical, the District Court, the U.S. Court of Appeals, the Third Circuit, the District Court’s, Ranbaxy Laboratories Ltd., MDL, the Court of Appeals, Pfizer and Ranbaxy, the State of West Virginia, EpiPen, King and Meridian, Mylan, the Tenth Circuit, Protonix and/or Nexium 24HR, GSK, Haleon, Docetaxel • Personal Injury Actions, Docetaxel, the Mississippi Consumer Protection Act, Zantac, Zantac OTC, Johnson & Johnson, the Federal MDL Court, the State of New Mexico, City Council of Baltimore, Judicial Council Coordinated Proceeding, the Superior Court of California, Champix, Monsanto Company, Monsanto, Solutia Inc., Pharmacia & Upjohn Company, Solutia, New Monsanto, Wyeth Holdings Corporation, American Cyanamid Company, Bound Brook, the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection, the Bound Brook, the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Iraqi Ministry of Health In, the Iraqi Ministry of Health, Allergan Finance LLC, the Supreme Court, the State of New York, Viatris Securities Litigation, the Court of Common Pleas of, Mylan N.V., the Upjohn Business, Transactions. Context excerpt: competition and/or violations of antitrust laws. In addition to the challenges to the U.S. patents that are discussed below, patent rights to certain of our products or those of our collaboration/licensing partners are being challenged in various other jurisdictions. Some of our collaboration or licensing partners face challenges to the validity of their patent rights in non-U.S. jurisdictions. For example, in April 2022, the U.K. High Court issued a judgment finding invalid a BMS patent related to Eliquis due to expire in 2026. In November 2022, BMS received permission to appeal the High Court’s decision and the appeal hearing was held in April 2023. In May 2023, the Court of Appeal dismissed the appeal. Additional challenges are pending in other jurisdictions. Also, in July 2022, CureVac AG (CureVac) brought a patent infringement action against BioNTech and certain of its subsidiaries in the German Regional Court alleging that Comirnaty infringes certain German utility model patents

For example, in April 2022, the U.K. High Court issued a judgment finding invalid a BMS patent related

competition and/or violations of antitrust laws.
